gw.document

Class DocumentCreationInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.document.DocumentCreationInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.web.document.DocumentWebFileInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentCreationInfo

    public class DocumentCreationInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.pl.web.document.DocumentWebFileInfo
    Encapsulates information about a Document entity currently being created in the UI.

    Document creation is a potentially complex process. Depending on the process being followed for a particular document, it could involve tracking a file uploaded by the user, new document contents created from a document template, or only some metadata fields. Further complicating the process is the possible presence or absence of the Guidewire Document Assistant control; if it is present, there is a set of information about the user's machine (location of temp files, etc) which also needs to be tracked.

    The DocumentCreationInfo class gathers all of these details into a single object. It should not be used outside of the document creation UI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> ContextObjectValueMap
      This is public to allow it to be referenced in the document creation PCF config
      Document Document
      Get the DocumentBase entity containing the metadata values for the newly created document.
      java.lang.String DocumentCreationScript
      Get the script, if any, which should be run on the user's machine as part of the document creation process. Whether or not the script is null will depend on the current stage of the document process and whether the Guidewire Document Assistant control is enabled.
      java.lang.String DocumentFilePath
      Gets the full path on the user's machine of the temp file containing the contents of the new document. May not always be available, depending on whether the Guidewire Document Assistant is enabled.
      IDocumentTemplateDescriptor DocumentTemplateDescriptor
      Get the {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} to be used to create the new document contents for this document.
      DocumentTemplateSearchResults DocumentTemplateSearchResults
      Get the {@link gw.pl.document.entity.DocumentTemplateSearchResults} selected by the user as a result of searching for document templates.
      DocumentCreationInfo.DynamicWidgetInfo[] DynamicWidgetInformation
      Return the set of DynamicWidgetInfo objects which correspond to the set of context object values which must be specified to create a new document from a document template.

      See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.
      WebFile File
      Get the {@link gw.api.web.WebFile} holding the contents of the newly created document. The contents are not stored to the document management system until the end of the process; in the meantime, the are held in the WebFile object.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentCreationInfo(Document document)
      Create a new DocumentCreationInfo instance, with the given DocumentBase entity to hold the metadata.
      DocumentCreationInfo(Document document, DocumentCreationInfo.GlobalContextProducer producer)
      Create a new DocumentCreationInfo instance, with the given Document entity to hold the metadata and the producer to set up the global context. The values set in the global context will not change even after the reset.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getContextObjectValue(java.lang.String contextObjectName)
      Get the currently set value for a particular context object for use in creation of the new document contents from a template. See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.
      java.lang.Object getDefaultContextObjectValue(java.lang.String contextObjectName)
      Get the default value for a particular context object for use in creation of the new document contents from a template. See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.

      Get the set of possible values for a particular context object for use in creation of the new document contents from a template. See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.
      void setCommitRequested(boolean commitRequested)
      Indicate whether the current Location should be committed once the new document contents have been uploaded. Required because the document contents are uploaded through a hidden frame, rather than through commit of the document creation Location.
      void setContextObjectValue(java.lang.String contextObjectName, java.lang.Object contextObjectValue)
      Set the current value for a particular context object for use in creation of the new document contents from a template. See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.
      void setDefaultContextObjectValue(java.lang.String contextObjectName, java.lang.Object defaultValue)
      Set the default value for a particular context object for use in creation of the new document contents from a template. See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.

      Set the script which should be run on the user's machine as part of the document creation process.
      void setDocumentFilePath(java.lang.String documentFilePath)
      Sets the full path on the user's machine of the temp file containing the contents of the new document.
      void setDocumentTemplateDescriptor(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplateDescriptor)
      Set the {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} to be used to create the new document contents for this document. For any fields on the document template descriptor which match up with fields on the DocumentBase entity (based on name), the values in the given document template descriptor fields will be copied over to the DocumentBase entity stored in this DocumentCreationInfo object.
      void setDocumentTemplateSearchResults(DocumentTemplateSearchResults documentTemplateSearchResults)
      Set the {@link gw.pl.document.entity.DocumentTemplateSearchResults} selected by the user as a result of searching for document templates. This will be used to retrieve the document template from the {@link gw.plugin.document.IDocumentTemplateSource} for use in creation the document contents.
      void setDocumentTemplateSearchResults(IDocumentTemplateSource docTemplateSource, IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplate)
      Set the {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} selected by the user as a result of searching for document templates. This will be used to retrieve the document template from the {@link gw.plugin.document.IDocumentTemplateSource} for use in creation the document contents.
      void setFile(WebFile file)
      Set the {@link gw.api.web.WebFile} holding the contents of the newly created document. The contents are not stored to the document management system until the end of the process; in the meantime, the are held in the WebFile object.
      void setFile(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mimeType, java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Set the {@link gw.api.web.WebFile} holding the contents of any document that is in the input stream. The contents are not stored to the document management system until the end of the process; in the meantime, the are held in the WebFile object.
      void setPossibleContextObjectValues(java.lang.String contextObjectName, java.lang.Object[] possibleValues)
      Set the set of possible values for a particular context object for use in creation of the new document contents from a template. See {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} for more information on context objects.

      • DocumentCreationInfo

        DocumentCreationInfo(Document document)
        Create a new DocumentCreationInfo instance, with the given DocumentBase entity to hold the metadata.
        Parameters:
        document - The DocumentBase entity for the new document being created

      • DocumentCreationInfo

        DocumentCreationInfo(Document document,
                    DocumentCreationInfo.GlobalContextProducer producer)
        Create a new DocumentCreationInfo instance, with the given Document entity to hold the metadata and the producer to set up the global context. The values set in the global context will not change even after the reset.
        Parameters:
        document - document entity for the new document being created
        producer - the producer to set up the global context

      • setCommitRequested

        void setCommitRequested(boolean commitRequested)
        Indicate whether the current Location should be committed once the new document contents have been uploaded. Required because the document contents are uploaded through a hidden frame, rather than through commit of the document creation Location.
        Parameters:
        commitRequested - True if the current Location should be committed once the new document contents have been uploaded, false otherwise.

      • setDocumentFilePath

        void setDocumentFilePath(java.lang.String documentFilePath)
        Sets the full path on the user's machine of the temp file containing the contents of the new document.

      • setDocumentTemplateDescriptor

        void setDocumentTemplateDescriptor(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplateDescriptor)
        Set the {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} to be used to create the new document contents for this document. For any fields on the document template descriptor which match up with fields on the DocumentBase entity (based on name), the values in the given document template descriptor fields will be copied over to the DocumentBase entity stored in this DocumentCreationInfo object.
        Parameters:
        documentTemplateDescriptor - The IDocumentTemplateDescriptor to be used to create the new document contents.

      • setDocumentTemplateSearchResults

        void setDocumentTemplateSearchResults(DocumentTemplateSearchResults documentTemplateSearchResults)
        Set the {@link gw.pl.document.entity.DocumentTemplateSearchResults} selected by the user as a result of searching for document templates. This will be used to retrieve the document template from the {@link gw.plugin.document.IDocumentTemplateSource} for use in creation the document contents.
        Parameters:
        documentTemplateSearchResults - The DocumentTemplateSearchResultsBase selected by the user.

      • setDocumentTemplateSearchResults

        void setDocumentTemplateSearchResults(IDocumentTemplateSource docTemplateSource,
                                    IDocumentTemplateDescriptor documentTemplate)
        Set the {@link IDocumentTemplateDescriptor} selected by the user as a result of searching for document templates. This will be used to retrieve the document template from the {@link gw.plugin.document.IDocumentTemplateSource} for use in creation the document contents.
        Parameters:
        docTemplateSource - The IDocumentTemplateSource to be used to retrieve the document template.
        documentTemplate - the selected document template

      • setFile

        void setFile(WebFile file)
        Set the {@link gw.api.web.WebFile} holding the contents of the newly created document. The contents are not stored to the document management system until the end of the process; in the meantime, the are held in the WebFile object.
        Parameters:
        file - The WebFile holding the contents of the newly created document.

      • setFile

        void setFile(java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String mimeType,
           java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Set the {@link gw.api.web.WebFile} holding the contents of any document that is in the input stream. The contents are not stored to the document management system until the end of the process; in the meantime, the are held in the WebFile object.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the document
        mimeType - MIME type of the document
        inputStream - inputstream that holds the content

        possibleValues - The set of possible values for that context object
